nodes.text: Office of the Alema Rar Task Force

The Office of the Alema Rar Task Force was a small chamber within the High Council quarter of the Jedi Temple. During the hunt for the Dark Jedi Alema Rar, Grand Master Luke Skywalker provided this office to Jagged Fel.

Located near a starship hangar, the office was large enough to house several desks and holo-monitors. Jag Fel also filled the room with training and hunting equipment needed to track and find the rogue Twi'lek. Other task force officers Jaina Solo and Zekk used the office as well.
When the Galactic Alliance Guard invaded the Temple, the trio abandoned their office and were forced to work from an old hangar on Kashyyyk.
